title: Ivan On Tech
body:
IP Objective: Ivan Liljeqvist 
Minimum Fund Raising Target: 500 000
Maximum Fund Raising Target: 1 000 000
Stake Pool Start Date: 2021.11.28 22:00
Stake Pool End Time: 2021.12.02  23:45

Ivan Liljeqvist, born in 1996 in Minsk, Belarus, is a Swedish YouTuber lecturer and entrepreneur best known for his youtube channel Ivan on Tech. At the age of nine, he moved from Minsk to Jönköping and thus continued his schooling in Sweden. Early on, Ivan developed a great interest in programming and began building apps and games during high school and high school. After graduating from the IB line in 2014, Ivan moved to Stockholm to study computer technology at the Royal Institute of Technology.

In 2017, Ivan started his Youtube channel Ivan on Tech where he deals with blockchain, cryptocurrencies, programming and other related topics. In May 2020, the channel had 227,000 subscribers and has been called one of the leaders in its field.

Ivan has made several appearances in both Swedish and international media to discuss cryptocurrencies, blockchain, and its role in society. In the autumn of 2019, Ivan participated as a guest in an episode of the Success Podcast entitled Largest in the world on bitcoin
author: 0x6c665834015f725Bd27FECDA2394806BE3b8D6d9
